Subject: Bob-ing around in space and time.
Message-ID: <3B2F48F0.14609.D58A34B@localhost>
Priority: normal
X-mailer: Pegasus Mail for Win32 (v3.12c)
From: "rAuq" <rauq@...>

--- Bob ---

Bob smiles and checks his clown-like appearance in the mirror, as 
he careens through space, not knowing where he is going, only 
that he IS going. His spaceship, a 15 metre in diametre spherical 
red orb, collides with an asteroid. Bob's head smashes into the 
small porthole that he had been looking out of. He shakes his head 
as his ship bounces off in another direction, heading into an 
asteroid field. Bob frowns, and buckles his seat belt, remembering 
what his mother had told him, "Buckle Up!" He had just never 
thought that he would need to use that information in his life. He 
grabs the saftey bars, and waits.


OOC: This is just me fooling around. =P
